DocAttribute.Name: PropertySource
DocAttribute.Documentation: The source of the fluid flow properties (e.g., are these design values, measured values, etc.).

DocAttribute.Name: FlowConditionTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: A times series defining the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.

DocAttribute.Name: VelocityTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: A time series of velocity values of the fluid.

DocAttribute.Name: FlowrateTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: A time series of flow rate values. Note that either volumetric or mass flow rate values should be specified.

DocAttribute.Name: PressureTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: A time series of pressure values of the fluid.

DocAttribute.Name: UserDefinedPropertySource
DocAttribute.Documentation: This attribute must be defined if the PropertySource is USERDEFINED.

DocAttribute.Name: TemperatureSingleValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Temperature of the fluid. For air this value represents the dry bulb temperature.

DocAttribute.Name: WetBulbTemperatureSingleValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Wet bulb temperature of the fluid; only applicable if the fluid is air.

DocAttribute.Name: WetBulbTemperatureTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: Time series of fluid wet bulb temperature values. These values are only applicable if the fluid is air.

DocAttribute.Name: TemperatureTimeSeries
DocAttribute.Documentation: Time series of fluid temperature values. For air, these values represent the dry bulb temperature.

DocAttribute.Name: FlowrateSingleValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: The flow rate of the fluid. Either a mass or volumetric flow rate shall be defined.

DocAttribute.Name: FlowConditionSingleValue
DocAttribute.Documentation: Defines the flow condition as a percentage of the cross-sectional area.
